verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
To the regions beyond,
I must go, I must go,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Till the world,
all the world,
His salvation shall know.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
To the regions beyond
I must go, I must go,
Where the story
has never been told;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
To the millions that never have heard of His love,
I must tell
the sweet story of old.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
To the hardest of places
He calls me to go,
Not thinking
of comfort or ease,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
The world may pronounce me a dreamer, a fool,
Enough if the Master
I please.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Oh, ye that are spending
your leisure and powers
In pleasures
so foolish and fond,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Awake from your selfishness, folly and sin,
And go
to the regions beyond.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
He sends me to gather
them out of all lands,
And welcome
them back to his fold.
